member.name: D3D10_COUNTER_INFO
member.summary: Information about the video card's performance counter capabilities.

member.name: D3D10_COUNTER_INFO.LastDeviceDependentCounter
member.summary: Largest device-dependent counter ID that the device supports. If none are supported, this value will be 0. Otherwise it will be greater than or equal to D3D10_COUNTER_DEVICE_DEPENDENT_0. See .

member.name: D3D10_COUNTER_INFO.NumSimultaneousCounters
member.summary: Number of counters that can be simultaneously supported.

member.name: D3D10_COUNTER_INFO.NumDetectableParallelUnits
member.summary: Number of detectable parallel units that the counter is able to discern. Values are 1 ~ 4. Use NumDetectableParallelUnits to interpret the values of the VERTEX_PROCESSING, GEOMETRY_PROCESSING, PIXEL_PROCESSING, and OTHER_GPU_PROCESSING counters. See for an equation.
